heading: HR01995
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY TO LOOK INTO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORT BY OCEAN CONSERVANCY INDICATING THAT THE PHILIPPINES IS AMONG THE TOP COUNTRIES IN THE WORLD THAT CONTRIBUTE TO PLASTIC WASTE LEAKAGE IN OCEANS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF REVIEWING AND STRENGTHENING THE ENFORCEMENT OF THE SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT ACT, OR CRAFTING NEW INNOVATIVE MEASURES TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE PROBLEM
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01995
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY TO LOOK INTO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORT BY OCEAN CONSERVANCY INDICATING THAT THE PHILIPPINES IS AMONG THE TOP COUNTRIES IN THE WORLD THAT CONTRIBUTE TO PLASTIC WASTE LEAKAGE IN OCEANS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF REVIEWING AND STRENGTHENING THE ENFORCEMENT OF THE SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT ACT, OR CRAFTING NEW INNOVATIVE MEASURES TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE PROBLEM

DATE FILED : 2018-07-11
